arts.ttl: Champions League | Atalanta 5-0 Sturm Graz: Match Report
arts.sum: Atalanta delivered a commanding performance in their UEFA Champions League Group Stage match, defeating Sturm Graz 5-0 and securing their path to at least the knockout phase play-offs. The post Champions League | Atalanta 5-0 Sturm Graz: Match Report appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Monaco beats Aston Villa in Champions League as Atalanta wins big
arts.sum: Aston Villa’s hopes of automatic qualification for the Champions League round of 16 took a blow after a 1-0 loss to Monaco on Tuesday, while Atalanta won big to keep up its strong campaign. Villa led the standings early in the league phase of the competition after winning its first three games.
